name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker gained access via a phishing email that executed malicious PowerShell scripts and deployed malware.

action--a9df5f20-8ddd-4e17-82f4-3db035e5.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--a9df5f20-8ddd-4e17-82f4-3db035e5.description: Terminate the malicious PowerShell process to prevent further damage.

if-condition--c6a8e12d-b6b9-46d8-b927-43.name: Check if malicious process was detected

action--c6a8e12d-b6b9-46d8-b927-43a2044f.name: Isolate host from network
action--c6a8e12d-b6b9-46d8-b927-43a2044f.description: Block the host from the network to prevent data exfiltration.

commands.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off

action--e6108fce-b6a7-4df3-b8d8-f47bc5c1.name: Run malware scan repeatedly until clean
action--e6108fce-b6a7-4df3-b8d8-f47bc5c1.description: Perform a malware scan and repeat until the host is clean.

loop--repeat_scan.name: Repeat scan loop
loop--repeat_scan.description: Continue scanning the host until it's confirmed clean.

if-condition--check_scan_result.name: After scan completion, check for clean status

vulnerability_id.description: The identifier for the vulnerability being patched.

action--2b3db5aa-3489-4814-a480-b2b446ee.name: Restore network connection
action--2b3db5aa-3489-4814-a480-b2b446ee.description: Re-enable network access for the host after confirming it's clean.

commands.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state on
